Functional JavaScript Snippets

JavaScript is a functional language. Here are some fun functional snippets.

Parse binary numbers with .reduce()

function parseBinary(str) {
  return str.split('').reduce(function(a, b) {
    return a * 2 + (b === '0' ? 0 : 1);
  }, 0);
}

parseBinary('0000') -> 0
parseBinary('0001') -> 1
parseBinary('111')  -> 7
parseBinary('1000') -> 8
